name: 蔡福裕
objective: 本課程是針對已修習一年的大學有機化學的同學，因此課程規劃成反應、機構與結構式等三個主要部分。修畢本課程的同學應已具有瞭解有機化學相關論文與研究成果的能力。
schedule:
1. 授課大綱及考試評分規定
2. Introduction to Cross-Coupling Reactions
3. Suzuki-Miyaura Coupling Reaction and Stille Reaction
4. Kumada-Corriu Reaction, Negishi Reaction, and Hiyama Reaction
5. Heck-Mizoroki reaction and Sonogashira Coupling
6. Cross-Coupling Reaction: C-S, C-O Coupling Reactions
7. Cross-Coupling Reaction: C-N Coupling Reactions
8. Preparation of Conjugated Polymers by Cross-Coupling Reaction
9. 期中考
10.Homocoupling Reaction-Csp-Csp Coupling
11.Homocoupling Reaction-Csp2-Csp2 Coupling
12.Cycloaddition: Pauson-Khand Reaction
13.Cycloaddition: Transition Metal Catalyzed [2+2+2] Cycloadditions
14.Green Chemistry: Green Solvents for Organic Reactions.
15.Green Chemistry: Recyclable Transition-Metal Catalysts.
16.Atom Transfer Radical Polymerization: Cu Catalyzed ATRP.
17.Atom Transfer Radical Polymerization: Ru, Ni, and Fe Catalyzed ATRP.
18.期末考
scorePolicy: 期中考, 期末考各佔50%
